mapper.select: SELECT t.id as id, t.title as title, t.menu_code as code, t.expand as expand, t.user_role as userRole, t.menu_url as menuUrl, t.parent_code as parentCode FROM sys_custommenu t
mapper.insert: insert into sys_custommenu ( id, title, menu_code, user_role, menu_url, expand, parent_code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{code}, #{userRole}, #{menuUrl}, #{expand}, #{parentCode} )
